author: Andrew Marino
title: Microsoft’s CTO explains how AI can help health care in the US right now
description: Kevin Scott discusses how AI and machine learning can use biometric sensing to possibly detect COVID-19
content:
How can machine learning assist with COVID-19 diagnoses? 
This week for our Vergecast interview series, Verge editor-in-chief Nilay Patel chats with Microsoft chief technology officer Kevin Scott about his new book Reprogramming the American Dream: From Rura… [+6980 chars]
